title: Portfolio State Snapshot v1
description: Static point-in-time snapshot of complete portfolio state published by Portfolio Service at regular intervals. Includes positions grouped by strategy, P&L, exposures, and fees.

portfolio_id.description: Unique identifier for this portfolio instance.

start_datetime.description: Backtest/simulation start datetime (UTC RFC3339 with Z suffix). When portfolio trading began.

snapshot_datetime.description: Timestamp when this snapshot was generated (UTC RFC3339 with Z suffix).

reporting_currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code for all monetary values (e.g., USD, EUR).

initial_portfolio_equity.description: Initial portfolio equity at start_datetime. Used for performance tracking. Decimal string.

cash_balance.description: Current cash balance as decimal string. Can be negative if using margin.

current_portfolio_equity.description: Current portfolio equity = cash + total_market_value. Decimal string.

total_market_value.description: Sum of all position market values across all strategies. Decimal string.

total_unrealized_pl.description: Total unrealized P&L from all current open positions. Decimal string.

total_realized_pl.description: Total realized P&L from inception (symbol-scoped, lifetime). Decimal string.

total_pl.description: Total P&L = total_realized_pl + total_unrealized_pl. Decimal string.

long_exposure.description: Sum of all long position values (positive). Decimal string.

short_exposure.description: Sum of all short position values (absolute value, positive). Decimal string.

net_exposure.description: Net exposure = long_exposure - short_exposure. Can be negative. Decimal string.

gross_exposure.description: Gross exposure = long_exposure + short_exposure (positive). Decimal string.

leverage.description: Leverage ratio = gross_exposure / total_portfolio_value (if equity > 0). Decimal string.

total_commissions_paid.description: Cumulative commissions paid from inception (positive). Decimal string.

total_dividends_received.description: Cumulative dividends received from long positions (cash accounting, positive). Decimal string.

total_dividends_paid.description: Cumulative dividends paid on short positions (cash accounting, positive). Decimal string.

total_borrow_fees.description: Cumulative borrow fees paid on short positions (positive). Decimal string.

total_margin_interest.description: Cumulative margin interest paid on negative cash balance (positive). Decimal string.

strategies_groups.description: Positions grouped by strategy. Each strategy can have multiple positions.

strategy_id.description: Unique identifier of the strategy that owns these positions.

positions.description: All positions owned by this strategy.

side.description: Position side: long (positive quantity), short (negative quantity), flat (zero).

open_quantity.description: Current open position quantity. Positive for long, negative for short, zero for flat.

average_fill_price.description: Average fill price = cost_basis / abs(open_quantity). Decimal string.

commission_paid.description: Total commission paid on fills that built current open position (positive). Included in cost_basis. Decimal string.

cost_basis.description: Total cost basis including commission = sum(lot.quantity * lot.entry_price) + commission_paid. Decimal string.

market_price.description: Current market price per share/unit. Decimal string.

gross_market_value.description: Current market value = open_quantity * market_price. Can be negative for shorts. Decimal string.

unrealized_pl.description: Unrealized P&L from current open position = gross_market_value - cost_basis. Decimal string.

realized_pl.description: Realized P&L for this symbol (lifetime, symbol-scoped) from all closed positions. Decimal string.

dividends_received.description: Cumulative dividends received on long positions for this symbol (cash accounting, positive). Decimal string.

dividends_paid.description: Cumulative dividends paid on short positions for this symbol (cash accounting, positive). Decimal string.

total_position_value.description: Total position value including dividends = gross_market_value + dividends_received - dividends_paid. Decimal string.

sector.description: Sector classification for risk analysis (e.g., Technology, Healthcare).

country.description: Country of primary listing (e.g., US, JP, UK).

asset_class.description: Asset class (e.g., Equities, Crypto, Forex, Fixed Income).

currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code for this position (e.g., USD, EUR).

last_updated.description: When this position was last modified (UTC RFC3339 with Z suffix).

currency_conversion_rates.description: Currency conversion rates to reporting_currency. Key=currency code, Value=rate as decimal string.
